frequent.question: How to book online appointment?
frequent.answer: You can book an online appointment by visiting our official website. Look for the Book Appointment section and follow the step by step process.

frequent.question: Do I need register to book an appointment
frequent.answer: Yes, you'll need to create an account with your name, contact information and email address. This ensures a seamless booking process and allows you to manage appointments

frequent.question: Are online appointments available for all departments?
frequent.answer: Most Department offer online availibility for specific department or doctors on our website.

frequent.question: What should I do if I miss my appointment?
frequent.answer: If you miss your appointment, we recommend contacting our hospital as soon as possible. Our Team will assist you in rescheduling at a convenient time.

frequent.question: How can I make an appointment in advance?
frequent.answer: You can shedule an appointment in adavance throught visit the hospital and speak to our front desk staff to book your appointment.

frequent.question: Can I reschedule or cancel my appointment?
frequent.answer: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel your appointment by calling us atleast 24 hours in advance.

service.heading: Clinical Services
service.description: Clinical services refer to the direct care provided to patients by healthcare professionals, focusing on managing diseases, injuries and other health conditions

service.heading: Inpatient Care
service.description: Inpatient care services refer to medical treatment and care provided to patient who are admitted to a hospital.

service.heading: Pharmacy
service.description: Pharmacy service encompass the preparation and appropriate use of medications to ensure patient safety and improve health outcomes

service.heading: Paediatrics
service.description: Paeditrics services focus on the healthcare and medical needs of infants and children typically up to the age of 18.

service.heading: Psychiatry
service.description: Psychiatrics are medical doctors who specialize in mental health and are trained to asses the psychological aspects of mental illness.

service.heading: Radiology
service.description: Radiology services involve the use of medical imaging technologies to diagnose and treat diseases, injuries, and other medical conditions.

service.heading: Emergency Medicine
service.description: Emergency medicine services provide immediate care for patients experience acute medical conditions and injuries.

service.heading: Cardiology
service.description: Cardiology services focus ont diagnosing, treating, and managing conditions related to the heart and circulatory system.

service.heading: Heaalth Check
service.description: The health check service provided by a hospital typically includes a comprehensive assessment of an individual's health status.

service.heading: Eye Care
service.description: eye care services in hospitals typically include a wide range  of diagnostic and surgical treatments for various eye conditions.

service.heading: Neurology
service.description: Neurology servoces focus on the diagnosis, treatment and management of disorders affecting the nervous system.

service.heading: Dental Care
service.description: Dental care services involve the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of oral health issues. These services aim to maintain healthy teeth
